updateTips.default:
v4.1 Change Log: Added: ♥ 3 new Bubble themes [6 taking custom colour options]. ♥ 3 new Message Indicator themes [4 in total taking custom colour option]. ♥ Option to search for themes in Theme Store.
Updated: ♥ Upload theme activity. Now Android version and Module version will be automatically filled. ♥ Module App UI Elements to better follow Android Lollipop Material UI Guidelines.
